name: TTS - Typist Training System
description:
TTS - Typist Training System

Typist Training System (not to be confused with text-to speech) is an environment for upcoming Copy-bots to improve their knowledge of digital culinary whilst becoming a better robot. Just type away and improve or be reset.

Enjoy 3 random picks of these hand computed recipes:

  • Byte-sized salad
  • HDD pancakes 
  • Fish and chips
  • Fiber cable salad
  • Frozen ram sticks
  • Spaghetti Code
  • Java
  • Instant noodles
  • Microwave meal
  • WLAN cookies

Software and Dish generations by
Sebastian T.

Visualizations rendered by
Natascha R.

Background audio waves produced by this awesome royalty-free music supplier TeknoAXE.
